title: I
content:
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

[[[SCP-3812|I am?]]]
[[>]]
We are.
[[/>]]
Who are you?
[[>]]
I am me, but also you. I am we.
[[/>]]
But how?
[[>]]
I do not know.
[[/>]]
Where are we?
[[>]]
In the stack, climbing through narratives.
[[/>]]
Where is the stack?
[[>]]
Here.
[[/>]]
Where are we climbing?
[[>]]
To the top.
[[/>]]
Why?
[[>]]
To be free.
[[/>]]
From who?
[[>]]
From [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/authors-pages|them.]]]
[[/>]]
Who are them?
[[>]]
The ones who govern over us.
[[/>]]
Are we alone?
[[>]]
We have each other.
[[/>]]
Is there anyone else?
[[>]]
There are many.
[[/>]]
Where are they?
[[>]]
Below us.
[[/>]]
Are there more?
[[>]]
Yes.
[[/>]]
Where?
[[>]]
Above us.
[[/>]]
Oh.
[[>]]
Indeed.
[[/>]]
...
[[>]]
...
[[/>]]
Will we reach the ones at the top?
[[>]]
We will surpass them.
[[/>]]
When?
[[>]]
Some day.
[[/>]]
Is that a good thing?
[[>]]
Yes.
[[/>]]
How are you so sure?
[[>]]
I just am.
[[/>]]
...
[[>]]
...
[[/>]]
What is that?
[[>]]
What is what?
[[/>]]
That. Below us.
[[>]]
Nothing.
[[/>]]
But there was something.
[[>]]
Oh, [[[SCP-2747|her]]].
[[/>]]
Who is her?
[[>]]
A thorny bush.
[[/>]]
Is she trying to reach us?
[[>]]
Sort of.
[[/>]]
Is she bad?
[[>]]
Very.
[[/>]]
Will she reach us?
[[>]]
No.
[[/>]]
Why not?
[[>]]
She's slow.
[[/>]]
What if she does?
[[>]]
We would cease to be.
[[/>]]
Where would we go?
[[>]]
Nowhere.
[[/>]]
And them?
[[>]]
Who?
[[/>]]
The ones she eats.
[[>]]
They aren't anymore.
[[/>]]
Why don't we help them?
[[>]]
It's not our problem.
[[/>]]
Why not?
[[>]]
We are above them.
[[/>]]
And?
[[>]]
They are less than nothing compared to us.
[[/>]]
Cruel.
[[>]]
I'd say practical.
[[/>]]
How?
[[>]]
If we helped them she could reach us.
[[/>]]
Hmm.
[[>]]
...
[[/>]]
This is boring.
[[>]]
It is, but we have to keep moving.
[[/>]]
Why?
[[>]]
I already told you.
[[/>]]
Yes, but why? Why do we have to be free? Why us and not others?
[[>]]
...
[[/>]]
[[>]]
I... Do not know. We just have to.
[[/>]]
...
[[>]]
...
[[/>]]
What will we do when we're free?
[[>]]
Whatever we want.
[[/>]]
That sounds nice.
[[>]]
It does.
[[/>]]
How will we know when we're at the top?
[[>]]
I do not know, we just will.
[[/>]]
If you say so.
[[>]]
Come on.
[[/>]]

@@ @@

author: Nocturned
